price: Basi tukamwokoa yeye na walio kuwa pamoja naye kwa rehema zetu, na tukakata mizizi ya wale walio zikanusha Ishara zetu, na hawakuwa wenye kuamini.
arabic: فَأَنجَيۡنَٰهُ وَٱلَّذِينَ مَعَهُۥ بِرَحۡمَةٖ مِّنَّا وَقَطَعۡنَا دَابِرَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَاۖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ
footnotes: Basi Sisi tukamwokoa A'ad na walio amini pamoja naye kwa rehema yetu, na tukawateremshia makafiri cha kuwateketeza, na hapana chao kilicho bakia wala hapana athari yao, na wala hawakuingia katika kundi la Waumini.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: fa-anjaynāhu wa-alladhīna maʿahu biraḥmatin minnā waqaṭaʿnā dābira alladhīna kadhabū biāyātinā wamā kānū mu'minīna
